### Inserindo tabelas: `tibble`

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(palmerpenguins)
penguins[1:4]
```


---
### Inserindo tabelas: `kable`

```{r}
knitr::kable(
  x      = head(penguins[1:4]), 
  format = "html"
  )
```


---
### Inserindo tabelas: `datatable`

```{r}
DT::datatable(
  data    = penguins[1:4],
  options = list(pageLength = 5)
  )
```


---
### Inserindo tabelas: `gt`

```{r}
gt::gt(head(penguins[1:4]))
```
